languages.text: Хоть дворяне и затаили на Вольного Торговца обиду, страх заставляет знать с усердием заняться своим долгом перед колонией.
Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.
languages.original_text: Хоть дворяне и затаили на Вольного Торговца обиду, страх заставляет знать с усердием заняться своим долгом перед колонией.

traits.locale_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.
Not expecting such a development, the horrified governor prays for mercy — your reputation is restored.

Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

languages.text: Si les nobles en veulent {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, la peur les incite néanmoins à s'acquitter de leurs devoirs envers la colonie.
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

traits.locale_text: Si les nobles en veulent {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, la peur les incite néanmoins à s'acquitter de leurs devoirs envers la colonie.

languages.text: 貴族たちは自由開拓者に恨みを抱いているが、恐怖心からコロニーへの責務を熱心に果たそうとしている。
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

traits.locale_text: 貴族たちは自由開拓者に恨みを抱いているが、恐怖心からコロニーへの責務を熱心に果たそうとしている。

languages.text: 尽管众多贵族对行商浪人充满怨恨，但出于恐惧，他们勤勉地履行着对殖民地的责任。
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

traits.locale_text: 尽管众多贵族对行商浪人充满怨恨，但出于恐惧，他们勤勉地履行着对殖民地的责任。

languages.text: Aunque los nobles guardan resentimiento a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, el miedo les hace cumplir fielmente su deber hacia la colonia.
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

traits.locale_text: Aunque los nobles guardan resentimiento a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, el miedo les hace cumplir fielmente su deber hacia la colonia.

languages.text: Die Adligen hegen nun zwar einen tiefen Groll gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, doch die Angst treibt sie dazu, ihre Pflicht der Kolonie gegenüber gewissenhaft zu erfüllen.
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.

traits.locale_text: Die Adligen hegen nun zwar einen tiefen Groll gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, doch die Angst treibt sie dazu, ihre Pflicht der Kolonie gegenüber gewissenhaft zu erfüllen.

languages.text: Soylular şimdi Hür Tacir'e kin beslese de korku onları koloniye karşı görevlerinde gayretli olmaya itiyor.
languages.original_text: Though the nobles are now resentful of the Rogue Trader, fear drives them to be diligent in their duty to the colony.
